public class zeta.content.zirp.Expr

(source file: Expr.pizza)

           +----zeta.util.AnnotatedTerm

                   +----zeta.content.zirp.Expr
The pure class interface. 
public class Expr
  extends AnnotatedTerm
The abstract syntax of Z expressions. Expressions and schema expressions are unified in this syntax. Schema expressions are generalized to allow the introduction of given and free type declarations.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: Expr.pizza,v 1.2 2000/07/06 09:18:24 wg Exp $

Binary(BinaryKind, Expr, Expr)
Binary operator
Binding(Eqn[])
Binding expression
Cond(Predicate, Expr, Expr)
Conditional expression.
Denotation(String)
Denotation literal.
Display(Expr[])
Set display expression, with elements of homogeneous type.
FreeType(NameDecl, Branch[])
Free Type
GivenType(NameDecl)
Given Type
Number(String)
Number literal.
Product(Expr[])
Cartesian product expression

Quantor expression.

Binding selection

Signature expression

Schema text

Tuple expression, with elements of heterogeneous type

Unary operator

A unification variable

Reference to a variable.

BinaryKind
Kind of binary operators.
Branch
Free type branch.
Decl
Declarations.
QuantorKind
Binding kind.
Rename
Renaming pair.
UnaryKind
Kind of Unaries.

Number
public case Number(String value);
Number literal.

Parameters:
value - the string representing the number literal.

Denotation

public case Denotation(String value);
Denotation literal.

Parameters:
value - the string representing the denotation literal.

Variable

public case Variable(NameAppl name);
Reference to a variable.

Parameters:
name - a name application, containing actualizations of generics.

Tuple

public case Tuple(Expr[] elements);
Tuple expression, with elements of heterogeneous type.

Parameters:
elements - the element expressions of the tuple, an array with length greater then 1.

Product

public case Product(Expr[] elements);
Cartesian product expression.

Parameters:
elements - the element expressions of the product.

Binding

public case Binding(Eqn[] bindings);
Binding expression.

Parameters:
bindings - a sequence of equations describing the binding.

Display

public case Display(Expr[] elements);
Set display expression, with elements of homogeneous type.

Parameters:
elements - the elements, all of the same type.

Cond

public case Cond(Predicate cond,
                 Expr thenPath,
                 Expr elsePath);
Conditional expression.

Parameters:
cond - the condition, a predicate.
thenPath - the path to be taken if cond is true.
elsePath - the path to be taken if cond is false.

Quantor

public case Quantor(QuantorKind kind,
                    Expr matrix,
                    Expr range);
Quantor expression.

Parameters:
kind - the quantor kind, such as lambda, mu, set-comprehension, schema quantification and so on.
matrix - an expression denoting a schema.
range - expression the matrix ranges over.

Select

public case Select(Expr oper,
                   NameAppl name);
Binding selection.

Parameters:
oper - an expressions denoting a binding.
name - a named component of this binding.

Unary

public case Unary(UnaryKind kind,
                  Expr oper);
Unary operator.

Parameters:
kind - the operation kind; mostly schema calculus operators.
oper - the operand.

Binary

public case Binary(BinaryKind kind,
                   Expr left,
                   Expr right);
Binary operator.

Parameters:
kind - the operation kind; mostly schema calculus operators.
left - the left operand.
right - the right operand.

Text

public case Text(Decl[] decls,
                 Predicate[] props);
Schema text.

Parameters:
decls - the sequence of declarations
props - the sequence of properties.

GivenType

public case GivenType(NameDecl name);
Given Type. Constructs a schema which contains the declaration of the given type in the signature.

Parameters:
name - the name of the given type.

FreeType

public case FreeType(NameDecl name,
                     Branch[] branches);
Free Type. Constructs a schema which contains the declaration of the free type in the signature.

Parameters:
name - the name of the free type.
branches - the branches of the free type.

UniVar

public case UniVar(Name name,
                   Expr oper);
A unification variable. The operand may be null to indicate that the variable is not bound. Does not appear usually in interchanged ZIRP.

Signature

public case Signature(Name[] names,
                      Expr[] types);
Signature expression. Does only appears in type expressions. Describes the type of a binding, that is a set of bindings.

Parameters:
names - array of names in the signature
types - array of types assigned to names at the corresponding index in names. The types are given as expressions.

  extends Term

  extends Term

  extends AnnotatedTerm

  extends Term

public static class Decl
  extends AnnotatedTerm

public static class Branch

public static class Branch
  extends AnnotatedTerm
Free type branch.
